name.baseName: cement production;cement, ordinary portland cement, 42.5MPa;new dry process;mixed solid wastes
水泥生产;水泥, 普通硅酸盐水泥, 42.5MPa;新型干法;混合固废

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Laboratory data. Carbide slag replaces limestone for cement production. The proportion of carbide slag in the raw material is 60%. The cement is produced by burning carbide slag generated by the acetylene industry in Heilongjiang. A pre-drying, dry grinding, and dry burning process developed by the Hefei Cement Research & Design Institute is used, which is currently an advanced dry process for producing cement using carbide slag. This process can increase the proportion of carbide slag in the raw material to over 60%, and the substitution rate of limestone can reach over 80%, and the stable formula increases the stability of carbide slag in the mill.
实验室数据。电石渣替代石灰石生产水泥。生料中电石渣配比60%。应用黑龙江乙炔化工行业所产生的电石渣烧制水泥。采用合肥水泥研究设计院开发了预烘干干磨干烧工艺，该工艺是目前较为先进的利用电石渣生产水泥的新型干法工艺。该工艺可使电石渣在生料配比提高到60%以上，石灰石替代率达80%以上，并且较为稳定的配料提高了电石渣入磨的稳定性。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The use of carbide slag to produce cement clinker in my country began in the 1970s, when traditional wet kilns were mainly used for production [5]. Subsequently, semi-wet process, wet grinding and dry burning process and direct grinding, dry grinding and dry burning process gradually appeared [57]. Due to the shortcomings of the above process such as low calcium carbide slag content (or limestone replacement rate), large production load, and high energy consumption, even if non-renewable limestone resources are saved to a certain extent, the overall environmental load caused by cement production is still at a high level. , which is detrimental to the sustainable development of the cement industry. With the technological advancement of cement production technology and the in-depth research on calcium carbide slag, the technology of using calcium carbide slag to produce cement clinker is also constantly improving. In 2005, Hefei Cement Research and Design Institute developed a pre-drying, dry grinding and dry-burning process, which is currently a relatively advanced new dry process for producing cement using calcium carbide slag [58]. This process can make calcium carbide slag be used in raw material preparation. The ratio increased to more than 60%, the limestone replacement rate reached more than 80%, and the relatively stable ingredients improved the stability of carbide slag into the grinding mill.

我国利用电石渣生产水泥熟料始于 20 世纪 70 年代，当时主要采用传统湿法窑生产[5]。随后，逐渐出现半湿法工艺、湿磨干烧工艺及直接入磨干磨干烧工艺[57]。由于上述工艺存在电石渣掺量(或石灰石替代率)低、生产负荷大、能耗高等缺点，即使在一定程度上节约了不可再生石灰石资源，水泥生产造成的总体环境负荷仍然处于较高的水平，而这对水泥工业的可持续发展是不利的。随着水泥生产工艺的技术进步和对电石渣研究的深入，利用电石渣生产水泥熟料的工艺也在不断进步。2005 年，合肥水泥研究设计院开发了预烘干干磨干烧工艺，该工艺是目前较为先进的利用电石渣生产水泥的新型干法工艺[58].该工艺可使电石渣在生料配比提高到 60%以上，石灰石替代率达 80%以上，并且较为稳定的配料提高了电石渣入磨的稳定性。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described is utilized in the production of ordinary Portland cement (OPC) with a compressive strength of 42.5MPa, where carbide slag replaces limestone as a raw material. This processed cement is optimized for building construction and other structural applications requiring high strength. The technology is specifically designed to increase the usage of industrially produced carbide slag, significantly substituting for the non-renewable resource of limestone. The advanced dry process technology enables a high substitution rate of carbide slag, making it particularly suitable for areas with access to acetylene industry byproducts.
该工艺用于生产42.5MPa普通硅酸盐水泥，其中电石渣替代石灰石作为原料。该加工水泥适用于建筑施工及其他需要高强度的结构应用。这项技术专为提高工业产生的电石渣利用率而设计，显著替代了不可再生的石灰石资源。先进的干法工艺技术能够实现高比例电石渣替代，特别适合有乙炔工业副产品的地区使用。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The functional unit is the performance of 1kg cement with a 28-day compressive strength of 42.5MPa, that is, 1Fu=42.5kgMPa. The scope of evaluation is raw meal preparation, clinker calcination and cement preparation. The environmental load caused by the consumption of clay resources is not considered for the time being. Iron powder is an iron correction material, and its environmental impact will not be considered. The wastes considered to be emitted at the output end of the product system mainly include nitrogen oxides, sulfur dioxide, carbon dioxide and dust.
以1kg28天抗压强度为42.5MPa的水泥所具有的使用性能作为功能单位，即1Fu=42.5kgMPa。评价范围为生料准备、熟料煅烧和水泥制备。粘土类资源消耗造成的环境负荷暂不考虑。铁粉属于铁质校正材料，其引发的环境影响不予考虑。产品系统输出端考虑排放的废弃物主要包括氮氧化物、二氧化硫、二氧化碳及粉尘。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 于淼. (2008). 黑龙江水泥工业可持续发展研究 [硕士, 哈尔滨工业大学].
于淼. (2008). 黑龙江水泥工业可持续发展研究 [硕士, 哈尔滨工业大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data set, ensure the parameters mimic the specific conditions of the pre-drying, dry grinding, and dry burning process developed by Hefei Cement Research & Design Institute. Include the high substitution rates of carbide slag at above 60%, with limestone substitution over 80%, ensuring alignment with the advanced dry process utilized. Exclusions in the analysis are the environmental load from clay resource consumption and impacts from iron powder as an iron correction material. Focus the environmental impact assessment on emissions of nitrogen oxides, sulfur dioxide, carbon dioxide, and dust associated with the described cement production process. Use the performance of 1kg cement with a 28-day strength as the functional unit for comparative purposes.

当使用该生命周期评估数据集时，确保参数模仿合肥水泥研究设计院开发的预烘干、干磨及干烧工艺的具体条件。要包括高于60%的电石渣代替率，以及高于80%的石灰石替代率，以确保与采用的先进干法工艺保持一致。分析排除粘土资源消耗造成的环境负荷和铁粉作为铁质校正材料引发的影响。将环境影响评估重点放在与所述水泥生产过程相关的氮氧化物、二氧化硫、二氧化碳及粉尘排放上。使用具有28天强度的1kg水泥的性能作为功能单位，以便于比较。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Carbide slag. In the raw material, the carbide slag ratio is 60%.
电石渣。生料中电石渣配比60%。
Standard coal. The original data is 0.108kg standard coal, here converted to hard coal, the conversion formula is 1kg hard coal = 0.929kg standard coal.
标准煤。原始数据为0.108kg标准煤，这里换算为硬煤，换算公式为1kg硬煤=0.929kg标准煤。
